item.title: Awk
item.description: ðŸ’¡ The name of AWK is derived from the surnames of its authors: Alfred Aho, Peter Weinberger, and Brian Kernighan. Print Lines Containing tom, jerry AND vivek # awk '/tom|jerry|vivek/' /etc/passwd Specify : as seperator # awk -F: '{print $1}' /etc/passwd use of printf # awk '{printf "%s ",$2}' file Command line on bash # awk ' BEGIN { actions } /pattern/ { actions } /pattern/ { actions } â€¦â€¦â€¦.

item.title: Find
item.description: Find files of size more than 1G # find . -type f -size +1G find and delete # find /home -type f -size +1G -delete find in all dir # find /path -iname 'yourstring*' -type f find . -name 'mystring*'
